welcome_to_cbp_desc: This is a your dashboard. Here you can see most helpful information: num of unique users, pages views, look at latest notifications and etc.
admin_home_desc: The best control panel for your applications based on CodeBits Platform
admin_notifications_desc: View latest actions and notifications in the CodeBits Platform Control Panel
admin_analytics_desc: Simple analytics system for your CodeBits Platform Application
admin_users_desc: Users manager for your CodeBits Platform Application
admin_editor_desc: Editor for system files, controllers, models and modules for your CodeBits Platform Application
admin_localization_desc: Localization manager for your CodeBits Platform Application
admin_pages_desc: Static pages manager for your CodeBits Platform Application
manage_langpack_desc: Edit fields below for change this language package. If you want to change current language for packages - choose another language in top-right corner. If you want to change current package - choose it in left menu.
component_name: Type a component name (without prefix, only english letters)
component_get_started_desc: Choose a system component for editing and select a component file (if its need) from left menu. After selection you can edit code of component. You also can create a new component. Just click "Add" icon in the bottom-right corner.
component_creation_desc: Choose params to create your component. Create a name and choose component type. Also you can create component from template.
settings_editor_section_desc_1: Here you can see database connection settings. In security reasons you are cannot edit this settings.
settings_editor_section_desc_2: Here you can edit general system settings and look at core version.
settings_editor_section_desc_3: Here you can change a frontend settings of your application
settings_editor_section_desc_4: Here you can change users system settings for your applicaion. For example: you can enable/disable registration.
settings_editor_section_desc_5: Here you can manage applicaion API configuration
settings_editor_tutorial_desc: Here you can change different system and components settings. Click here to save this settings.
settings_error: Failed to save settings. Request is not contain all needed data
settings_module_not_found: One of autoload module is not found in the system
s_wrong_api_domain: API domain must be contain a valid URL adress or *
s_wrong_params: Settings is not contain all neded data
s_public_email: Please, type your public website email
s_wrong_modules: Modules field must contain only comma separated modules name (0-9,a-z,A-Z,-)
s_wrong_version: Please, type your application code in right format (example: "1.0")
s_lang_notfound: Folder with files for Default language not found.
manage_pages_desc: Here you can manage static pages for your website. Right now you are not have a pages, but you can create it!
pages_editor_tutorial_desc: Here you can create, edit and remove pages from your website on different languages. Click here to create a first page.
page_editing_desc: Here you can edit your page. Just fill all fields on different languages. If you not use another languages - will be used default language.
page_creation_desc: Here you can create a new page. Just fill all fields on different languages. If you not use another languages - will be used default language
component_editor_tutorial_desc: Here you can edit and create your application components. Click here to create a new component.
media_editor_tutorial_desc: Here you can see an applicaion media files and upload new files. Just click here to add new media.
media_confirm_remove_text: This file will be deleted forever. Are you sure?!
media_confirm_removed_desc: This media file was removed from server
media_confirm_canceled_desc: Deletion canceled. This file is avanable for your application and in safety :)
home_tutorial_desc: Welcome! You can start working quickly - just click here and choose one of most important function.
user_editor_tutorial_desc: Here you can create, remove or edit user profiles. Click here to create a new user.
t_analytic_users_help: All registred users at this day
t_analytic_media_help: Size of all media-files in the application storage
fast_cache_desc: Here you can manage fast-cache system files. This system based on saving cache copies in the static files. We are highly recommend periodically clear cache storage for the best perfomance.
t_cache_files_help: Here you can see latest 20 cache files
t_last_visitors_help: Info about latest 20 visits per day
error_no_lang_array: Failed to save language package. Request not contains language strings.
error_no_lang_name: Failed to save language package. Request not contains language name.
error_no_lang_pack: Failed to save language package. Request not contains package name.
error_convert_lang_pack: Failed to save language package. Failed to convert this package to JSON.
error_save_lang_pack: Failed to save language package. Failed to save this package.
error_comtype_notfound: Failed to save data. Component type  not exists
error_comtype_wrong: Failed to save data. Wrong component type.
error_comname_notfound: Failed to save data. Component name not found
error_comname_wrong: Failed to save data. The name of component must be contain only english letters and "_", and must be from 3 to 25 symbols.
error_comtpl_notfound: Failed to save data. Component template not found
error_com_exists: Failed to save data. Component of this type with similar name is already exists.
error_comfile_notfound: Failed to save data. Component filename not found
error_comcode_notfound: Failed to save data. Component code not found
error_page_desc: Page short description is cannot empty
error_page_slug: Page system name (URL) is cannot empty
error_page_tags_length: Field with short description must contain not more than 200 symbols
error_page_desc_length: Field with short description must contain from 10 to 200 symbols
error_page_title_length: Field with page title must contain from 3 to 50 symbols
error_page_slug_length: Field with system name (URL) must contain from 3 to 50 symbols
error_page_slug_symbols: Page system name (URL) must be contain only english letters, numbers and "-" or "_"
